dataList.content: By the command of the Nursefather, the Thumb Apprentice is forbidden from using powerful attacks on Ryōshū.
Using the same Sinner to repeatedly Clash against the Thumb Apprentice is not recommended.
Make sure to win Clashes against the Thumb Apprentice's other Attack Skills before he unleashes a deadlier Skill.
Prioritizing the Parts that interfere with destroying the Fruit can sometimes be the better strategy.
It is important to keep track of which Part each Sinner is targeting.
Take into account what E.G.O you bring into your team so that you can gather the necessary resources more easily.
Prepare a strategy that can win Clashes against the Pinky Apprentice's deadlier Skills.
Choosing the right way to handle the enemy's deadliest attacks matters more than assigning Clashes to every slot.
Clashing is not the only way to weaken the Ring Apprentice's most dangerous Skill.
The Ring Apprentice's Defense Skill inflicts Bleed—exercise caution when Clashing with it.
